alert.note: Alert for Kane; Washington (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 16 at 3:06PM MDT until August 16 at 6:15PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: The National Weather Service in Salt Lake City has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... Western Kane County in southern Utah... Eastern Washington County in southwestern Utah... * Until 615 PM MDT. * At 306 PM MDT, Zion National Park rangers report flash flooding occurring that is visible from the Scenic Drive. Doppler radar indicates thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area. Between 0.5 and 1 inch of rain has fallen. Flash flooding is already occurring. HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Trained spotters reported. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks, rivers, slot canyons, and streams. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Zion National Park, Springdale, North Fork of the Virgin River. FLASH FLOOD...OBSERVED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
